mapper.insert: insert into member (uid, upw, uName, uBirth, uPhone, uEmail, uGender, uZipcode, uAddr, joinTM) values (#{uid}, #{upw}, #{uName}, #{uBirth}, #{uPhone}, #{uEmail}, #{uGender}, #{uZipcode}, #{uAddr}, now())
mapper.update: update member set upw=#{upw}, uBirth=#{uBirth}, uPhone=#{uPhone}, uEmail=#{uEmail}, gender=#{gender}, uZipcode=#{uZipcode}, uAddr=#{uAddr} where uid=#{uid}
